entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 10:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: E 23 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
